metadata.title: NODC Ocean Current Drifter Data
metadata.description:
Parameter
surface and subsurface currents

Measurement Details
surface currents (almost all from ship drift, plus some GEK data)- includes summaries by area by month; subsurface data  (1972-1992) are from SOFAR, RAFOS and ALACE neutrally buoyant floats and are mostly from the North Atlantic.

PSARC_Utility
"Limited potential use ""as is"". Potentially, data could be summarized in sub-regions and compared with recent measurements to detect anomalies in open ocean circulation patterns.  These data could also be used to validate circulation models"

Improvements
nothing appropriate at this time

Base Internet/URL
http://www.nodc.noaa.gov

A TCODE project
